mapper.select: select technology_id, technology_name, price, vital_process_period, standard_capacity, overtime_standard_capacity, overtime_overfulfil_capacity, double_capacity, overfulfil_capacity from technology
mapper.insert: insert into technology (technology_id, technology_name, price, vital_process_period, standard_capacity, overtime_standard_capacity, overtime_overfulfil_capacity, double_capacity, overfulfil_capacity) values (#{technology.technologyId}, #{technology.technologyName}, #{technology.price}, #{technology.vitalProcessPeriod}, #{technology.standardCapacity}, #{technology.overtimeStandardCapacity}, #{technology.overtimeOverfulfilCapacity}, #{technology.doubleCapacity}, #{technology.overfulfilCapacity})
